Name: Azure Purview
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The [Azure Purview](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/purview/overview) solution enables data sensitivity enrichment of Microsoft Sentinel. Data classification and sensitivity label logs from Azure Purview scans are ingested and visualized through workbooks, analytical rules, and more.

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in Preview state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: 

 a. [Azure Monitor Resource Diagnostics ](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/)
